messages.zh: 第二关（后）
messages.tl: Second off (post)
...not bad.

messages.zh: 罗德岛正需要你这样的头脑，可不能让凯尔希过度劳累了。
messages.tl: Rhode Island is in need of your mind, can not let Kal'tsit overworked.
Dobermann...

messages.zh: 不是现在。我们还没有驻足休息的余裕。
messages.tl: not now. We have not yet rested on the rest of Yu Yu.

messages.zh: ——动起来！快！
messages.tl: - Move it! fast!
Call, call...

messages.zh: 向阿米娅道歉
messages.tl: Apologize to Amiya

messages.zh: 啊，不，不......博士才是，该道歉的是我......
messages.tl: Ah, no, no... Doctor is, the apology is me...

messages.zh: 明明你什么都不清楚......我还强行把你拉进战斗......
messages.tl: Obviously you don't know anything... I also forced you into the battle...

messages.zh: 甚至把你和罗德岛小队的诸位都卷进危险......
messages.tl: Even taking you and the Rhode Island team into danger...
I am really...

messages.zh: 博士......唉？不要紧吗？我做的很好了？
messages.tl: Doctor... oh? It doesn't matter? I am doing very well?

messages.zh: 作战会议时你就说过，营救{@nickname}博士本身就是相当危险的任务。
messages.tl: As you said during the combat meeting, the rescue of Dr. PLAYER itself is a very dangerous task.

messages.zh: 但如果是重要的伙伴，肯定不能坐视不理吧？
messages.tl: But if it is an important partner, you can’t sit back and ignore it?

messages.zh: 我参与作战，就是因为已经认可了你的作战计划。
messages.tl: I am involved in combat because I have already approved your battle plan.

messages.zh: 阿米娅，挺起胸膛。整个罗德岛小队的安危依然由你把握着。
messages.tl: Amiya, stand up. The safety of the entire Rhode Island team is still up to you.

messages.zh: 临光小姐还在保证中城区撤退路线的安全。
messages.tl: Miss Nearl is still guaranteeing the safety of the retreat route in Midtown.

messages.zh: 我们去与他们会合吧，不要让他们等太久！
messages.tl: Let's meet them, don't let them wait too long!
